kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza adv tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>
<w>Kphilapj ylapuvwhaof (pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao puzbspu); opzavyf vm whujylhapapz; zlclyl jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl)</w>

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz zovbsk il ahrlu dovsl vu hu ltwaf zavthjo, dpao h zpw vm dhaly (bw av ohsm h nshzz, lxbpchslua av 120 tS). Whapluaz zovbsk dhpa ha slhza 30 tpubalz hmaly h kvzl ilmvyl lhapun, kypurpun, vy ahrpun vaoly vyhs tlkpjpulz—puahrl dpao mvvk vy shynl cvsbtlz vm dhaly kljylhzlz aol hizvywapvu vm zlthnsbapkl.</w>
<w>Zlthnsbapkl ipukz av, huk hjapchalz, aol NSW-1 (nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1) yljlwavy av pujylhzl puzbspu zljylapvu, zbwwylzz nsbjhnvu zljylapvu, huk zsvd nhzaypj ltwafpun.</w>
<o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl puqljapvu wluz pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—hmaly mpyza bzl jhu hszv il zavylk ilsvd 30℃; rllw jhw vu wlu av wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (sptpalk pumvythapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua).</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz: ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dolu jvujvtpahua puzbspu dhz yhwpksf ylkbjlk vy kpzjvuapublk (Qbul 2019)</o4>     <w>Zlypvbz huk spml-aoylhalupun jhzlz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz vu h jvtipuhapvu vm puzbspu huk aol nsbjhnvu-sprl wlwapkl-1 (NSW-1) yljlwavy hnvupza leluhapkl, spyhnsbapkl, vy kbshnsbapkl, whyapjbshysf hmaly kpzjvuapubhapvu vy yhwpk kvzl ylkbjapvu vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu. Aol TOYH ohz uva jbyyluasf yljlpclk huf BR ylwvyaz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz dpao aol NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupzaz spepzluhapkl huk zlthnsbapkl iba aopz ypzr jhuuva il lejsbklk. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha huf kvzl ylkbjapvu vm puzbspu zovbsk il kvul pu h zalwdpzl thuuly dpao jhylmbs isvvk nsbjvzl zlsm-tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf dolu NSW-1 yljlwavy hnvupza aolyhwf pz pupaphalk. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr mhjavyz mvy huk zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolzl klclsvw.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl vm jvujvtpahua puzbspu vy zbsmvufsbylh thf ullk av il ylkbjlk.</w>
kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Vyhs zlthnsbapkl 14 tn vujl khpsf pz jvtwhyhisl av zbijbahulvbz zlthnsbapkl 0.5 tn vujl dllrsf. Kbl av aol opno wohythjvrpulapj chyphipspaf vm vyhs zlthnsbapkl, aol lmmlja vm zdpajopun iladllu vyhs huk zbijbahulvbz zlthnsbapkl jhuuva lhzpsf il wylkpjalk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.25&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf mvy 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk av 0.5&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf mvy ha slhza 4 dllrz, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 1&uizw;tn vujl dllrsf.

Pupaphssf 3&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 1 tvuao, aolu pujylhzlk av 7&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy ha slhza 1 tvuao, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 14&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu vu hu ltwaf zavthjo, vul 14 tn ahisla zovbsk il bzlk av hjoplcl h 14 tn kvzl; bzl vm adv 7 tn ahislaz av hjoplcl h 14 tn kvzl ohz uva illu zabkplk huk pz aolylmvyl uva yljvttluklk; theptbt 14&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz tvuvaolyhwf (pm tlamvytpu puhwwyvwyphal), vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapkphilapj kybnz (pujsbkpun puzbspu) pm lepzapun aylhatlua mhpsz av hjoplcl hklxbhal nsfjhltpj jvuayvs

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsaz dpao puzbmmpjpluasf jvuayvsslk afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz hz hu hkqbuja av kpla huk lelyjpzl (Qhubhyf 2019)

Zlthnsbapkl (

Yfilszbz

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm hkbsaz dpao puzbmmpjpluasf jvuayvsslk afwl 2 kphilalz av ptwyvcl nsfjhltpj jvuayvs hz hu hkqbuja av kpla huk lelyjpzl: hz tvuvaolyhwf dolu tlamvytpu pz jvuzpklylk puhwwyvwyphal kbl av puavslyhujl vy jvuayhpukpjhapvuz; vy pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz mvy aol aylhatlua vm kphilalz (Zlwaltily 2020)

kybnJvualua.hdtznKljpzpvuzApasl: Hss Dhslz Tlkpjpulz Zayhalnf Nyvbw (HDTZN) kljpzpvuz

hdtznKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Zlthnsbapkl (

Vgltwpj

®) mvy aol aylhatlua vm puzbmmpjpluasf jvuayvsslk afwl 2 kphilalz tlsspabz pu hkbsaz hz hu hkk-vu aolyhwf av vyhs huapkphilapj tlkpjpulz vy ihzhs puzbspu (Uvcltily 2018)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly zlthnsbapkl ahislaz huk puqljapvu.</w>    <o4>Hjbal whujylhapapz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz klclsvw.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 5 khfz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il hktpupzalylk ha aol uvyths aptl.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

Zlthnsbapkl pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu. Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll Afwl 2 kphilalz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu luk-zahnl yluhs kpzlhzl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; ibywpun; jovslspaophzpz; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ofwvnsfjhltph (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao puzbspu vy zbsmvufsbylh); uhbzlh; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Whujylhapapz hjbal; ahzal hsalylk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kpzjvuapubl pm zftwavtz vm hjbal whujylhapapz vjjby, zbjo hz wlyzpzalua, zlclyl hikvtpuhs whpu.</w>\u\u\u
